title: Array of Design
desc: A slice of interior Design view

title: Beautiful Summer Accent
desc: Granite white wall table accented with a beautiful splash of coral color, overlooking a fresh summer view.

title: Kitchen with a Splash
desc: Granit counter top with an accented marbled high dense ceramic floor and backsplash, giving contrast with the clear white cupboards.The symetric top and bottom cupboards design, accenting height.

title: Arizona delight
desc: Oval entries highlighting wall height, accented with soft-summer fresh fabric gives a breath of delight.

title: Architecturally atuned
desc: Architectural display, where sunk-in cubbies, defines the spacial feature highlighted with a central deco-simulated support structure, giving a breath to its spacial height.

title: Indoor Rec-garden
desc: A beautifully-natural light nature designed giving calm and ponderance of tranquil thought.

title: Soft Accented Lounge
desc: A soft-color accented lounge where peace-of-mind belongs.

title: peaceful place to sleep
desc: A bedroom that allows deep and restful sleep for the soul.

title: Bathroom of Tranquility
desc: A bathroom that gives a woman calmness to her end-day.
